message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair play, right?
I think I deserve a bit more, don't you?
Let's be reasonable. I'm willing to give you a little more, but I also need to get a fair share.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve the bigger share.
Okay, I'm willing to concede a bit more. Let's get this done before the value drops further.
I'm not budging much, the value is dropping fast!
Look, Bob, the value is dropping fast. We're both going to lose a lot if we don't agree now. Let's split it evenly and get out of this.
